name: Keydown recorder
Keydown recorder - silent
format:
<script>
    (function(scope) {
        document.addEventListener('keydown', function(evt) {
            scope.send({topic : "keydown" , payload: evt.key , ctrlKey : evt.ctrlKey , shiftKey : evt.shiftKey , altKey : evt.altKey});
        });
        document.addEventListener('keyup', function(evt) {
            scope.send({topic : "keyup" , payload: evt.key , ctrlKey : evt.ctrlKey , shiftKey : evt.shiftKey , altKey : evt.altKey});
        });
    })(scope);
</script>

name: Info
info:
Other properties of keyboard events:
https://www.w3schools.com/jsref/obj_keyboardevent.asp
Other properties of touch events:
https://www.w3schools.com/jsref/event_touch_touches.asp

name: Keydown and touch recorder - silent
format:
<script>
    (function(scope) {
        document.addEventListener('keydown', function(evt) {
            scope.send({topic : "keydown" , payload: evt.key , ctrlKey : evt.ctrlKey , shiftKey : evt.shiftKey , altKey : evt.altKey});
        });
        document.addEventListener('keyup', function(evt) {
            scope.send({topic : "keyup" , payload: evt.key , ctrlKey : evt.ctrlKey , shiftKey : evt.shiftKey , altKey : evt.altKey});
        });
        document.addEventListener('touchstart', function(evt) {
            scope.send({topic : "touchstart" , payload: {x: evt.touches[0].clientX, y: evt.touches[0].clientY}});
        });
        document.addEventListener('touchend', function(evt) {
            scope.send({topic : "touchend" , payload: evt});
        });
        document.addEventListener('touchcancel', function(evt) {
            scope.send({topic : "touchcancel" , payload: {x: evt.touches[0].clientX, y: evt.touches[0].clientY}});
        });
        document.addEventListener('touchmove', function(evt) {
            scope.send({topic : "touchmove" , payload: {x: evt.touches[0].clientX, y: evt.touches[0].clientY}});
        });
    })(scope);
</script>

name: Only touch recorder - silent
format:
<script>
    (function(scope) {
        document.addEventListener('touchstart', function(evt) {
            scope.send({topic : "touchstart" , payload: {x: evt.touches[0].clientX, y: evt.touches[0].clientY}});
        });
        document.addEventListener('touchend', function(evt) {
            scope.send({topic : "touchend" , payload: evt});
        });
        document.addEventListener('touchcancel', function(evt) {
            scope.send({topic : "touchcancel" , payload: {x: evt.touches[0].clientX, y: evt.touches[0].clientY}});
        });
        document.addEventListener('touchmove', function(evt) {
            scope.send({topic : "touchmove" , payload: {x: evt.touches[0].clientX, y: evt.touches[0].clientY}});
        });
    })(scope);
</script>
